mapper.select: SELECT comm.id AS id, comm.code69 AS code69, b.name AS brandName, comm.name AS NAME, comm.category_one_id AS categoryOneId, comm.category_two_id AS categoryTwoId, comm.category_three_id AS categoryThreeId, comm.company_name AS companyName, comm.origin_place AS originPlace, comm.market_time AS marketTime, comm.created_at AS createdAt, comm.created_by AS createdBy, comm.updated_at AS updatedAt, comm.updated_by AS updatedBy, (SELECT NAME FROM comm_category WHERE id = comm.category_one_id) AS categoryOneName, (SELECT NAME FROM comm_category WHERE id = comm.category_two_id) AS categoryTwoName, (SELECT NAME FROM comm_category WHERE id = comm.category_three_id) AS categoryThreeName FROM commodity comm LEFT JOIN comm_brand b ON comm.brand_id=b.id WHERE code69 = #{code69}

SELECT id, code69, name, category_one_id AS categoryOneId, category_two_id AS categoryTwoId, category_three_id AS categoryThreeId, company_name AS companyName, origin_place AS originPlace, market_time AS marketTime, created_at AS createdAt, created_by AS createdBy, updated_at AS updatedAt, updated_by AS updatedBy FROM commodity WHERE code69 = #{code69}

mapper.update: UPDATE commodity SET name=#{name},brand_id = #{brandId} WHERE id = #{id}
